intro: Epidendrum caloglossum, commonly known as the golden lip orchid, is a tropical orchid native to Central and South America. It is characterized by its pendulous, showy inflorescences that bear bright yellow to orange flowers with a distinctive lip. The plant typically grows as an epiphyte, attaching itself to trees in humid, shaded environments.
